income_messages:
From: w***************9@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-07 19:15:15
SUBJECT: Dear Future Partner
Dear Future Partner
It was a great pleasure contacting you with this media. Let me first
introduce myself I am Mrs. Bright Williams I work with Proton
Securities
I have an important business proposal that will benefit both of us but
it must be top secret. Please keep it highly confidential.
My aim of contacting you is because I want us to work together as a
team. I need an honest and trustworthy person that can handle it
without any discrepancy. During our annual routine auditing I
discovered a dormant file of a Peru businessman who died 3 Years ago.
It has a trunk Box containing 100kg of gold. This Consignment is
supposed to be delivered in his country before his death. I want you
to present yourself as the person who is supposed to receive the Gold.
I will use our legal department to change the entire delivering
document in your name as a new beneficiary and will be delivered
directly to your country. We share it 50/50.
Honesty, trust and good cooperation is absolutely important. If you
are willing to work with me we will start the process immediately.
Contact me via Email:  
williamsbright839@gmail.com
Regards
Mrs. Bright Williams.
From: w***************9@gmail.com
To: yr87893@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-09 01:34:22
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Future Partner
Dear Mr. Ralph
Thanks to your prompt response, it’s very clear that I have invited you to
work with me. Like I have written in my proposal, the depositor of this
100kg of gold fell to the cold hands of a motor accident and we do not
know next
of kin to his deposit with us.
His death is only known to me and our IT manager in charge of the company
database, I have consulted him before making this decision and there is no
way we can get this out except using a proxy person hence i have written
you to be part of this, it’s important for you to know that without us
doing this the gold will be stalked and finally will be released to
government who we take bonds with.
You may be conversant that if your company is using a government Bond all
transactions with your company will be accounted for, such as tax and
income revenue accreditation with government, especially the IRS in our
case we call it here in Ghana GRS (Government Revenue services).
It will be my pleasure if you will give your full support to this and we
will share accordingly. It will be my pleasure if i will have your call
details and if possible, WhatSapp which is end to end encrypted for privacy
reasons.
The situation here does not demand that you must come from Peru; it’s the
duty of the IT manager to configure your information as will be provided by
you to the database as the next of Kin to the late owner of the deposited
consignment.
Please reason with me and if we can go along, send to me your full details
as it is in any of your government Issued identification, which will do for
now for startups.
Once your information is configured alongside our late client deposit
information as his next of kin, which might be a member of his family or a
business partner, then we can be able to raise a new deposit certificate
that will bear your full name as the next of kin and wipe out the old
information. This will not take two days to do and we are good to Go. The
deposited Gold is 22+ carat with purity  of 97.6. I hope I have provided a
good detail to go along.
I anticipate your quick Response.
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Bright Williams
From: w***************9@gmail.com
To: yr87893@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-09 07:37:25
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Future Partner
Thank you for your support!  send me your full details for documentation
outbound_messages:
From: yr87893@m**************m
To: w***************9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-07 19:15:16
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Future Partner
That sounds not really well, but I think I can do something helpful.
From: yr87893@m**************m
To: w***************9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-09 03:00:20
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Future Partner
I am really impressed about what you are doing now. I wish I could help you.
From: yr87893@m**************m
To: w***************9@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-09 09:14:36
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Future Partner
I am really sorry to hear that and I think I can help with this situation.
Please just tell me what I can do for you.

Dear Future Partner
